154.content:
As you begin to wake up you notice the ground benteath you is...Somewhat wet..you look up and see that you're also moving, you appear to be outside but something is odd..A bunch of half human half animals are walking around! Though they look more animal then human. "Where..the heck am i!?" you ask yourself as you stand up. the ground beneath you shakes though and you fall back onto your front. "And what the heck am i standing....on?" It's at this point you notice it, the object your standing on is on the end of a large snout. It's a dogs nose! 'OH CRAP!" you exclaim as you turn around seeing a familiar cartoon characters eyes. It's Shriek, a member of the greasers from catdog! "but..how is that...What is..." you stutter to yourself as the eyes lock on you, you gulp as you await what happens next..

"What the heck...? Great...now i got fleas!" You hear her say as she growls at you as she quickly...

1553321121.content:
Danny Fenton woke up. He was in a chair, in his classroom, but something was off. Everything was massive!

Then his world shook as the gigantic footsteps of his friend Sam brought her down the row of desks to one presumably empty: Danny's! Danny tried to go ghost, but found that he could not. Then he tried to wave his arms and catch the attention of Sam. It didn't work. Instead, Sam turned around and sat down in her chair, enveloping the tiny Danny under her black-and-green-skirt-clad ass.

Danny, out of options, tried to wriggle and squirm his way out of her butt. Meanwhile, Sam tried to get comfortable, but felt...
1553321121.title: Sam

1553322222222222222311122.title: Tak tries to convince her to shrink back.

15533222222222222223111221.content: Jeera smiles as she says that, following it with "Bigger is better." then Tak begins to think. Jeera puts Tak between her feet, knowing he likes them. Tak's response is..
15533222222222222223111221.title: "How about instead, you make me BIGGER?"

155332222222222222231112211.content: He slowly nods and says "Alright, alright. I'll make you bigger. Not too much bigger, though, Jeera!" then he zaps her. She begins to grow again, 60 ft.. 70 ft.. 80 ft.. 90 ft.. Finally, 100 ft! She laughs and jumps, shaking the entire village, saying "I think I'm the biggest chief ever!" and Tak asks "Chief? But you're the chief's daughter." then she says "Hey! I'm bigger than he could dream of!" and she wiggles her toes, saying "Uh, Tak, I think you made my feet a little too big." then Tak notices, saying "I can fix that." then Jeera picks up Tak and says "Nah, leave it." then Jeera..
155332222222222222231112211.title: Yes.

155332222222222222232121.title: Fink, the adorable rat girl assistant!

1553322222222222222321211.content:
Fink grinned. "With the boss offworld with Billiam.. Maybe I should give his new device a little try!"

She walked into the 'special chamber' with a devilish grin on her face.

She read the description on the machine. "Enlarger, huh?"

"Well!" She said, with a mischievous laugh. "I'd enjoy being bigger!"

She flipped the switch and stepped in front of the growth ray.

It began to loudly whir before zapping her.

She laughed. "Yes!" She said, loudly as she grew.

Her shoes, however, did not grow, leaving her barefoot..

How big does she get from this blast?
1553322222222222222321211.title: Story 1

15533222222222222223222111.content:
During a fight with the villain of the week, Ladybug and Cat Noir were struck with a beam of light!
The beam of light didn't affect them, yet. After getting rid of the Akuma aka butterfly, something was wrong.
15533222222222222223222111.title: Story 1

155332222222222222232221111.content:
She gasps as she says "C-Cat Noir.. We have a big problem.." as she grew to 7 ft.
Cat Noir gasped as he saw the now 7 ft Ladybug, saying "Well.. I do like tall girls." with a laugh, in his normal flirty nature.
She gave him a death stare and says "This is serious!" then she tries her lucky charm, which fails to give her anything useful.
She gulped as she realized her mistake, her power would run out soon since she used her lucky charm!
She surged larger yet again! 10 ft! Standing up straight in doors would be an issue.
She was down to 3 minutes before changing back. She had two choices.

Reveal her secret to Cat Noir. (She ends up having a sleepover with Adrien while they try to figure this out.)

Risk her parents freaking out.
155332222222222222232221111.title: Ladybug is growing!

info.brief_description: Yes, another giantess story for writing.com! This one has all the classic cartoons
info.description:
A classic/New Cartoon network story for giantess loves of (most) types, don't be shy! feel free to add! i will add on a regular basis as well. Please use proper grammar, keep the characters IN character.

Seeing as this is a 18+ story, there are a few rules, chapters that do not follow these rules will be deleted.

ALLOWED:
-Feet
-Soft vore
-Gentle giantess
-Shrinking
-growth
-Body part expansion
-Brest play

NOT ALLOWED:
-Scat (no poo for you)
-hard vore
-anal vore (Sorry but no)
-Male giants
-crush
-One line chapters
-Bad grammar
===============================================================

Follow these rules and we'll get along just fine :D.
